page.title: 20A Typical Saturday in Otley
page.content:
On a Saturday I awake at 9.00am.I get dressed then go down stairs for my breakfast,which is a bowl of Cornflakes and a cup of tea.After I then watch the television for three quarters of an hour. I then go into town with my Mum and buy the necessery things for that week. I then have my lunch which is something light so it won't fill me up if I want to go out to play. After my lunch I either play or watch GRANDSTAND(a sports programme)till about 5.00pm.Then I my tea which is usually some salad. After I watch television.While watching I have some sweets,at a time of about 10_10.30 I go to bed.
EDITED BY BEN SWANTON.
